title: Need 1910 T210 Old Mill Lave Cross to complete Charlotte set
author: BrettHoneycutt

posts.post_title: Need 1910 T210 Old Mill Lave Cross to complete Charlotte set
posts.post_content:
I collect Charlotte minor league baseball cards, and just need the 1910 T210 Old Mill Lave Cross to complete the Old Mill T210 Charlotte set.

I recently completed the 1910 T209 Contentnea Charlotte set, and just need the Old Mill Lave Cross to complete the T210 set.

Any condition would be okay.

Thank you,

Brett
